adf85dc2929fa965456bb2415478bd0125471b5ce35245","dweb:/ipfs/QmRaydGr8BTHs1kvaZfsNU69pKzUAGFrvABn1KiRSbE51y"]}},"version":1}

params.interest: - interset rate contract used by line that will calculate interest owed

calculateValue(int256,uint256,uint8).details: - Assumes Oracle returns answers in USD with 1e8 decimals                 - If price < 0 then we treat it as 0.

params.amount: - The amount of tokens being valued.
params.decimals: - Token decimals to remove for USD price
params.price: - The Oracle price of the asset. 8 decimals

returns._0: - The total USD value of the amount of tokens being valued in 8 decimals

computeId(address,address,address).details: - Creates a deterministic hash id for a credit line provided by a single Lender for a given token on a Line of Credit facility

params.lender: - The address managing the credit line concerned
params.line: - The Line of Credit facility concerned
params.token: - The token being lent out on the credit line concerned

params.oracle: - interset rate contract used by line that will calculate interest owed

repay(ILineOfCredit.Credit,bytes32,uint2.details: uses uncheckd math. assumes checks have been done in caller

withdraw(ILineOfCredit.Credit,bytes32,ad.details: uses uncheckd math. assumes checks have been done in caller

params.credit: - The lender position that is being bwithdrawn from

accrue(ILineOfCredit.Credit,bytes32,addr.notice: see ILineOfCredit._accruecalled by LineOfCredit._accrue during every repayment function

calculateValue(int256,uint256,uint8).notice: - Calculates value of tokens.  Used for calculating the USD value of principal and of interest during getOutstandingDebt()

create(bytes32,uint256,address,address,a.notice: see ILineOfCredit._createCreditcalled by LineOfCredit._createCredit during every repayment function

repay(ILineOfCredit.Credit,bytes32,uint2.notice: see ILineOfCredit._repaycalled by LineOfCredit._repay during every repayment function

withdraw(ILineOfCredit.Credit,bytes32,ad.notice: see ILineOfCredit.withdrawcalled by LineOfCredit.withdraw during every repayment function

documentation.text: @notice Emitted when Lender withdraws from their initial deposit
@notice Emitted when Lender withdraws interest paid by borrower
@notice Emits amount of interest (denominated in credit token) added to a Borrower's outstanding balance
@notice Emits when Borrower has drawn down an amount (denominated in credit.token) on a credit line
@notice Emits that a Borrower has repaid some amount of interest (denominated in credit.token)
@notice Emits that a Borrower has repaid some amount of principal (denominated in credit.token)

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct ILineOfCredit.Credit memory,bytes32,address) returns (struct ILineOfCredit.Credit memory)

documentation.text:
@title Credit Cooperative Line of Credit Library
 @notice Core logic and variables to be reused across all Credit Cooperative Marketplace Line of Credit contracts
